list_definition.definition: an imaginary little old man in children’s stories who has a pointed hat, lives under the ground, and guards buried treasure.
a plastic or stone figure of a gnome that is used in a garden as a decoration

list_ex_of_english: This nice touch that some gnome in some department thought up, "a reproduction silver inkstand", was very interesting.
